channel.title: How Do I Get Players?
channel.description: I've tried many ways on my server to get more players, lots of voting, a youtube video, forum posts, server adverstising, etc. can someone please reccomend a new way to get alot of players? because ive been open for 2 weeks, and the second someone logs on and sees 0-4 players they log off, so i cant recieve more people. Help?

item.title: How Do I Get Players?
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

Java what else should he do?

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Get Players?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

You need to create a welcoming environment for new players rather than log on in edgevile, and go strait to training. You need to show them how your server is unique when they join so they have a reason to stay.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Get Players?
item.dc:creator: @youda_fucking_best youda fucking best
item.description:
@youda_fucking_best wrote:

If players aren’t staying, you probably don’t have a good community, nor do you probably have a good server.

Just from personal experience.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Get Players?
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

To be honest, those are the main ways to advertise unless you pay for advertisements on several top used websites.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Get Players?
item.dc:creator: @savages savages
item.description:
@savages wrote:

I’ve tried many ways on my server to get more players, lots of voting, a youtube video, forum posts, server adverstising, etc. can someone please reccomend a new way to get alot of players? because ive been open for 2 weeks, and the second someone logs on and sees 0-4 players they log off, so i cant recieve more people. Help?
